name: Super Switch
description: Super Switch is a difficult platformer in which you have to actively switch between 2 dimensions. It's tougher than iron and extremely rewarding.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 2.0Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0Ghz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 300 MB available space
